RoadmapPage.title: Roadmap to the Future
RoadmapPage.banner.title: Roadmap to the Future

RoadmapPage.roadmap.desc: Develop intelligent hardware products and core monitoring technology; create essential tool apps to meet immediate user needs; establish initial data collection and management systems to prepare for the next phase.

Develop intelligent TCM diagnostic algorithms to improve monitoring accuracy; refine personalized recommendation systems for precise health management; expand open datasets to support more research and applications.
Build a robust developer ecosystem to support third-party apps; expand globally to promote TCM internationally; deepen community building for mutual growth between users and the platform.

RoadmapPage.footnote: We are moving step by step toward the intelligent future of TCM and look forward to your company on this journey.
RoadmapPage.seo.title: Roadmap to the Future - HeyTCM
RoadmapPage.seo.description: HeyTCM Roadmap: Discover our development stages, goals, and future plans. Witness every step in the evolution of intelligent TCM.
